text: Alfred "Freddy" Léonard (December 19, 1940 – January 26, 2018) was a Belgian politician. He served as the Mayor of Ferrières, Belgium from 1977 until 1992. Léonard also served as on the Provincial Council of Liège from 1977 until 1985, as well as a deputy in the national Chamber of Representatives of Belgium from 1985 to 1991 and a member of the regional Parliament of Wallonia from 1985 until 1991. Freddy Léonard died on January 26, 2018, in Banneux, Belgium, at the age of 77. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Members of the Chamber of Representatives (Belgium) Category:Mayors of places in Belgium Category:Members of the Parliament of Wallonia Category:Walloon politicians
title: Alfred Léonard
